meanings: (몸의) injury, abrasion, (총·칼 등으로 인한) wound, (칼에 베인) cut, (멍 등의 타박상) bruise, contusion, (찰과상) scratch
(아내를 잃다) lose one's wife, be bereaved of one's wife

vlive.korean: 그렇게까지 상처받고도 잊지 않을 남자가 어디 있냐? Everybody would forget, after getting hurt so much. 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 니들 나한테 용사따윈 바라지 마라![넘버식스]ep8.
vlive.english: Everybody would forget, after getting hurt so much.

vlive.korean: 영광의 상처? It's an wound of honor. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV6] EP2 3rd Universe MAMAMOO?
상처 보이죠? You see the scar, right? 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : YUB Night🌙
나는! 절대 상처받지 않아! I! I will never get hurt! 듣기 View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : 몽슈슈 글로벌하우스 Ep2. [니가 왜 거기서 나와?]
vlive.english: I! I will never get hurt!

vlive.korean: '손에 난 상처 다 나았나요?' "Did your scar got better?" 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : 즐거운 주말되세요^^

examples.korean: His legs were covered with weeping sores. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 다리는 진물이 흐르는 상처투성이였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His legs were covered with weeping sores. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The cut healed up without leaving a scar. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 베인 상처는 흉터 없이 나았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The cut healed up without leaving a scar. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Bathe the wound and apply a clean dressing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 상처를 세척하고 깨끗한 붕대를 감아라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Bathe the wound and apply a clean dressing. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The bruising was not contiguous to the wound. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 타박상은 상처에 근접해 있지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The bruising was not contiguous to the wound. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was bleeding from a gash on his head. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 머리에 난 깊은 상처에서 피를 흘리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was bleeding from a gash on his head. Add to Wordbook
